entry.title: SAP Public Cloud ADT Package deleted
entry.content:
Dear All

While working over SAP Public Cloud using Eclipse ADT , we connected it with Git to move the package to another project but due to some unknown reason instead of exporting and importing the package from Git to new projects, its imported back to original project and now many files, applications , cds , https services are inconsistent and many are deleted.

Any possibility to retrieve it back. Like if we can export and import the whole package from QAS back to development system.

entry.title: Which solution worked?
entry.content: Even i have similar requirement to update EKPO-RELV in ME32l ME31L .

entry.title: Reference quotation number wonâ€™t get passed through paramater ids
entry.content:
Hey guys,

 

I have a requirement to call the va01 from a custom program. basically i need to use reference quotation and create sales orders using that reference number. 

when i tried parameter ids it only passes data to the fields in the initial screen (order type, sales org etc). But doesnt work for the reference quotation. I tried with bdc and it works fine. 
But i dont want to use bdc as bdc has its own issues. 

is there any customer exit or badi for this requirement?

 

basically when calling the transaction if theres a reference quotation number i need fields of the reference quotation in my va01 screen as the standard behavior 

any help would be appreciated 

 

thanks and regards, 

Praveen de Silva

entry.title: Custom logic onPremise for PRICING_DOCUMENT_REQUIREMENT
entry.content:
Hello,

We want to remove our VOFM-coding and switch them to the Custom Logic "function". In the first step we want to test this with ID "PRICING_DOCUMENT_REQUIREMENT".

I was able to add an implementation with ID, but I'm not able to follow the attached documentation.

https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/a376cd9ea00d476b96f18dea1247e6a5/82e0fb545ab4495ea83511ba57465e28.html?locale=en-US

So my problem is now, what is to do after my implementation in the document under 2.? My test-ID is 12345.

We are on 2023 01 (02/2024).

Thank you for your help!

entry.title: Doubt for optimize abap code in BADI
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I need to create a relationship between a position and another object in infotype HRP1001.
Currently, I am implementing a BAdI and receiving the parameter is_ee_org_ass_repl_req.

Within the implementation, I am executing several SELECT statements inside a LOOP AT to build the required structure. However, this approach is causing performance issues due to multiple database queries.How can I avoid executing queries inside a LOOP AT, which is causing performance issues?

Regards

entry.title: FM for creating 1708 inspection lot
entry.content:

Which approach will be used for creating the 1708 inspection lot.
Via /n/scwm/mon
or Creating stock transfer from blocked to quality?
Will /n/scwm/post work?
In addition to batch what linkage can be maintained between the inspection lot & Quality Notification. HU? How it can be done

entry.title: How to customize push notification payload to send additional data from S4 to SSAM
entry.content:
Currently in the standard push notification feature for SAP Service and Asset Manager, only the object key of particular object like Notification number for Notification and Order Id for Work Order is sent to mobile device in push notification payload. Sample payload:

{"notification":{"alert":"{\"title-loc-key\":\"NOTIF_TITLE_KEY\",\"title-loc-args\": [\"1000000000\"],\"loc-key\":\"NOTIF_BODY_KEY\",\"loc-args\": [\"1000000000\"]}","data":"{\"ObjectType\":\"Notification\",\"ObjectID\":\"1000000000\"}"}

But we want to show additional details in the push notification message like notification description and technical object description. We found the exact method which generates the payload. Class /MFND/CL_CORE_OTRIG_CPMS_PUSH  and method is BUILD_JSON_DATA.

But in this method, we are only able to get Object Key (Notification Number) and no other data. Also we are not able to fetch relevant data from table as notification is not yet saved.

Does anyone knows how can we handle this situation and how to send additional data like Technical object description in this payload. Any BAdI available for this or how to achieve this?

entry.title: job_output_info getting empty
entry.content:
i am working on one project that has module pool program in that one screen and one button.

i am suffering to solve error is that job_output_info is empty when i run program then first print preview dialog open and when i come back from print preview job_output_info is empty.

ls_control-no_dialog = 'X'.
ls_control-preview = ' '.
ls_control-no_open = ' '.
ls_control-no_close = 'X'.
ls_control-getotf = 'X'.
ls_control-device = 'PRINTER'.
ls_output-tddest = 'LP01'.
ls_output-tddataset = 'BOH'.
ls_output-tdsuffix2 = 'HEALTH LETTR'.

CALL FUNCTION lv_name
EXPORTING
control_parameter = ls_control
output_options = ls_output
user_settings = ' '
payslip_id = ph11-payslip_id
emp_dept_data = emp_dept_data
IMPORTING
job_output_info = ls_job_output_info
TABLES
itab_emp_payslip_ite3 = itab_emp_payslip_ite3.

entry.title: How to Unassign Freight Unit (FU) from Freight Order (FO) using BOPF action in ABAP (SCMTMS/TOR)?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I am working on an ABAP development requirement within SAP Transportation Management (TM) and need to programmatically unassign a Freight Unit (FU) from a Freight Order (FO).

In an other development method DO_ACTION of class /bobf/if_tra_service_manager was used to assign to freight unit to freight order with the following code:

 

DATA: lo_srv_mgr    TYPE REF TO /bobf/if_tra_service_manager.

*-- Initialize service manager for TOR
  lo_srv_mgr = /bobf/cl_tra_serv_mgr_factory=>get_service_manager( /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_bo_key ).

  TRY.
      CALL METHOD lo_srv_mgr->do_action
        EXPORTING
          iv_act_key    = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_action-root-add_fu_by_fuid   
          it_key        = VALUE #( ( key = <la_un>-db_key_odn ) )     "GUID FREIGHT ORDER
*         it_key        = lt_n_fo_key
          is_parameters = NEW /scmtms/s_tor_a_add_elements( string = lv_fu_str )  " FREIGHT UNI
*         is_parameters = lr_s_parameters
        IMPORTING
          eo_message    = lo_message
          et_failed_key = DATA(lt_fail).
    CATCH /bobf/cx_frw_contrct_violation.
  ENDTRY.

Now I was thinking about doing something similar, but I can't find the right action key among costants in /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_action .

Any suggestions?
Thanks in advance

Thanks

entry.title: Text area in a modal dialog box
entry.content:
Hi, 

I have created a screen as a modal dialog box and added custom control so that i want to enter multiple email recipients but when i called screen it is not showing text area in editable mode but if called it as a normal screen then it is working fine. Please share your thoughts. 

 

REPORT ztest_textarea.
START-OF-SELECTION.
  DATA lt_text TYPE TABLE OF text_512.
  DATA(lo_container) = NEW cl_gui_custom_container( 'TEXTAREA' ).
  DATA(lo_textedit) = NEW cl_gui_textedit( parent = lo_container
                                           wordwrap_mode = cl_gui_textedit=>wordwrap_at_fixed_position ).
  lo_textedit->set_toolbar_mode( 0 ).
  CALL SCREEN 1001 STARTING AT 10 10 ENDING AT 50 80.

Regards,

Ravi

entry.title: SAP Query creation date issue
entry.content:
Hello Team, 

I am facing one issue in SAP query, 

Requirement: - Just to remove field hardcode value in Query, & field level condition in Infoset.

Now After regenerate Infoset & adjust to query, one field is not visible in selection screen of Query.  

In SQ01, creation date field select option check box is not visible inside query. and it is greyed out in the selection list, so because of this creation date is not visible in selection screen.

What should I do to get the field in selection screen?

entry.title: How to find the Class with Material Number (MATNR) or Configuration (CUOBJ)?
entry.content:
Hi all,

I am looking for a way to find the class of a configurable (KMAT) material with class type 300, based on the material number (MATNR) or the configuration (CUOBJ). Note the the characteristics have do not yet have any values assigned in the material master.

The material number and CUOBJ are retrieved from the sales order item (table VBAP).

I have tried the following tables:

  • KSSK
  • INOB
  • AUSP
  • CABN
  • KLAH

But I could not find any results for the material number or CUOBJ.

Any tips on how this can be achieved? Which tables can be linked?

Thanks in advance,

 

Floyd
